about_the_game:
This DLC contains bonus voices for all standard characters.
They can be set via the Options screen and used while in online battle by pressing the pause button/key.

  • Lev LeFanu
  • Katie Xia Xuejuan
  • Henri Xia Xiaotien
  • Mieze Merckx
  • Ursure Uexkull
  • Giles Hitzfeld
  • Beak Chang Po
  • Dixie Dutilleux
  • Cuilan
  • Sakurako Sanjo
  • Jasper Hilquit Hongo
  • Alessandro Gixlardino
  • Fabian the Fastman
  • Lili F Levinas
  • Shinobu Sanjo
  • Philomena Pasquini
  • Theo Tveit
  • Gustav Grafenburg

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i3-4160 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible

short_description: This DLC contains bonus voices for all standard characters. They can be set via Options screen.
